history.proof: intros A P x Hx. auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (P : Ensemble A), Included P P

Premises:
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For Cj: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For D: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF
Included = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => forall x : U, In U B x -> In U C x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Argument U is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Included_Full_set : forall (A : Type) (P : Ensemble A), Included P (Full_set A)
Included_Complement_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Included P (Complement A Q) < -> Disjoint A P Q
Included_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q P' Q' : Ensemble A), Included P P' -> Included Q Q' -> Disjoint A P' Q' -> Disjoint A P Q
Disjoint_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Disjoint A P Q < -> Disjoint A Q P
Same_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set P Q < -> pointwise_relation A iff P Q
Union_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Union A P Q v < -> P v \/ Q v
Intersection_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Intersection A P Q v < -> P v /\ Q v
Intersection_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A Q P)
Union_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A P Q) (Union A Q P)
Disjoint_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Disjoint A P Q < -> (forall x : A, P x -> Q x -> False)
Complement_Included_rev : forall (U : Type) (P Q : Ensemble U), Included P Q -> Included (Complement U Q) (Complement U P)
Union_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A (Union A P Q) R) (Union A P (Union A Q R))
Intersection_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Intersection A P Q) R) (Intersection A P (Intersection A Q R))
Intersection_Union_distr_r : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P (Union A Q R)) (Union A (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A P R))
List.Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> List.Forall P l -> List.Forall P (x :: l)
Union_right_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Disjoint A R (Union A P Q) < -> Disjoint A R P /\ Disjoint A R Q
Union_left_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Disjoint A (Union A P Q) R < -> Disjoint A P R /\ Disjoint A Q R
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
Intersection_Complement : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Complement A P) (Complement A Q)) (Complement A (Union A P Q))
Included_trans : forall P Q R : Ensemble ?A, Included P Q -> Included Q R -> Included P R where ?A : [ |- Type]
Union_Included : forall P Q R : Ensemble ?A, Included (Union ?A P Q) R < -> Included P R /\ Included Q R where ?A : [ |- Type]
Intersection1_Included : forall P Q R : Ensemble ?A, Included P R -> Included (Intersection ?A P Q) R where ?A : [ |- Type]
Included_Empty : forall (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U), Included (Empty_set U) A
left_Included_Union : forall P Q : Ensemble ?A, Included P (Union ?A P Q) where ?A : [ |- Type]
List.Forall_nil : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), List.Forall P nil
Intersection2_Included : forall P Q R : Ensemble ?A, Included Q R -> Included (Intersection ?A P Q) R where ?A : [ |- Type]
Same_set_refl : forall (A : Type) (S : Ensemble A), Same_set S S
right_Included_Union : forall P Q : Ensemble ?A, Included Q (Union ?A P Q) where ?A : [ |- Type]
Intersection_absort_left : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Included B A -> Same_set (Intersection U A B) B
Intersection_absort_right : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Included A B -> Same_set (Intersection U A B) A
Same_set_sym : forall (A : Type) (S1 S2 : Ensemble A), Same_set S1 S2 -> Same_set S2 S1
Intersection_Union_distr_l : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Union A Q R) P) (Union A (Intersection A Q P) (Intersection A R P))
Full_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A), Full_set A v < -> True
Empty_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A), Empty_set A v < -> False
Same_set_trans : forall (A : Type) (S1 S2 S3 : Ensemble A), Same_set S1 S2 -> Same_set S2 S3 -> Same_set S1 S3
Union_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union U B C u -> P u
Union_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union U B C u -> P u
Empty_set_ind : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop) (u : U), Empty_set U u -> P u
Inhabited_ind : forall (U : Type) (B : Ensemble U) (P : Prop), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P) -> Inhabited U B -> P
Inhabited_sind : forall (U : Type) (B : Ensemble U) (P : SProp), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P) -> Inhabited U B -> P

```coq
intros A P x Hx. auto.
Qed.```
